Item.Value: [Name:Introduction][Text:Again, I thank you for your aid. It would appear that the Spirits took my previous offerings and, as a result, left me trapped. Perhaps we might help one another?]
[Name:IntroYes][Text:Oh. How interesting. In that case, you should speak with $2$, he and his husband make excellent weapons.]
[Name:Insects][Text:I was speaking to the insects in the forest last night. They didn't have anything interesting to say, but they're good listeners.][Default]
[Name:Strange People][Text:I've been alone for quite some time you know. Being around people agian is... strange, but exhilarating. You are all so very strange.][Default]
[Name:Collection][Text:Is that for me? Oh! Thank you! It's just what I've been looking for! How did you know?]
[Name:Selection][Text:You have returned. What do you require of me?][Selection:VillageTalk]

[Name:Task_10_Start][Text:I have been contemplating my next move and I think that this village you shall make a fine home for me to continue my research, at least for now. I am... a scholar of sorts, seeking out relics of the past and present. I wish to record the various items and resources found int his land. You are a Builder, yes? As such, your duties will have you scouring the land for your materials. I ask only that you bring them to me as well, so that I may research them. Herbs, Potions, Relics from the past as well as any tomes you might find. I will make it worth your while to furnish my $WorldObject_30$.][UnlockObjectID:30]
[Text:Sorry,I'm very busy today. Maybe in a few days I can go with you again.][Name:JoinPartyNo]
